statements: SELECT * FROM search_queries WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT query_text, query_timestamp FROM search_queries ORDER BY query_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, query_text FROM search_queries WHERE query_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT query_text FROM search_queries WHERE clicked_link = TRUE AND user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS query_count FROM search_queries GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY query_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM search_queries WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY query_timestamp DESC;
SELECT query_text, clicked_link FROM search_queries WHERE query_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_queries FROM search_queries GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_queries > 1;
SELECT * FROM search_queries WHERE query_text LIKE '%example%' AND query_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(query_id) AS avg_query_id, SUM(user_id) AS total_user_id FROM search_queries WHERE clicked_link = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM search_queries;
SELECT id, query FROM search_queries WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, query, timestamp FROM search_queries ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT query FROM search_queries WHERE query LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, query, timestamp FROM search_queries WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM search_queries WHERE id = 1;
SELECT query, timestamp FROM search_queries WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE action = 'clicked' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, result_id FROM user_behavior WHERE result_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT action FROM user_behavior WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM SearchQueries WHERE query_id = 1;
SELECT query_text FROM SearchQueries WHERE search_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT query_id, query_text FROM SearchQueries WHERE search_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SearchQueries ORDER BY search_date DESC;
SELECT query_id, query_text, search_date FROM SearchQueries WHERE query_text LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT * FROM SearchQueries WHERE search_date = '2022-09-15'
SELECT query_id, query_text FROM SearchQueries WHERE query_id = 1
SELECT query_text FROM SearchQueries WHERE search_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-10'
SELECT query_id, query_text, search_date FROM SearchQueries ORDER BY search_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT query_text FROM SearchQueries WHERE query_text LIKE '%database%'
SELECT * FROM SearchQueries;
SELECT id, query, user_id FROM SearchQueries ORDER BY search_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, query, search_timestamp FROM SearchQueries WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT u.username, u.email, count(ub.action) as actions_count FROM Users u INNER JOIN UserBehavior ub ON u.user_id = ub.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeDiscovery WHERE discovery_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM SearchQueries WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY search_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, action, behavior_timestamp FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeDiscovery WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM Users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01') ORDER BY discovery_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_queries, user_id FROM SearchQueries GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_queries > 10 ORDER BY total_queries DESC;
SELECT * FROM search_queries WHERE query_id = 1;
SELECT query_text, query_timestamp FROM search_queries WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, preference_category, preference_value FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM search_queries WHERE query_timestamp <= NOW() ORDER BY query_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, action, behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE action = 'search' AND behavior_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY behavior_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, discovery_topic, relevance_score FROM knowledge_discovery WHERE relevance_score > 0.8 ORDER BY relevance_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, preference_category, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY preference_id ASC;
